attributes.action: Ensure that sentencing fits the crime regardless of perpetrators background.
attributes.additional_details: Mustafa Bashir actions and offences should have been what determined the sentence passed. His stunted career progression should not have been a deciding factor between a prison sentence and walking free.
attributes.background: Mustafa Bashir (07/04/2016) has today been  jailed for 18 months for domestic violence when just a week ago he was spared jail on the ground that his potential career with Leicestershire County Cricket Club would be prevented by a custodial sentence.

rejection.details: Decisions about sentences in individual cases are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.
